timeline.title: Timeline Visualizer
timeline.description: This tool allows you to create a visual rotation timeline (e.g. for a raid). You can select students, adjust the spacing between them, set the cost/timestamp at which the student's skill cost should be used, and more.
timeline.notice: Note: Dark mode extensions and zoom levels may cause rendering issues in the resulting image. If the generated image looks weird, try disabling any dark mode extensions you may have and using 100% zoom.
timeline.mobileNotice: Note: This tool might not work well on mobile devices.

settings.title: Settings
settings.name: Timeline Name
settings.descriptionPlaceholder: Enter a description for this timeline (optional)

description.signedIn: You have unsaved changes in your timeline. Would you like to save it in the cloud before leaving the page?
description.signedOut: You have unsaved changes in your timeline. Would you like to save it in your browser before leaving the page?

bond.title: Relationship Rank Calculator
bond.description: Using this tool you can calculate the relationship rank of a student based on what gifts you give to them. This tool can be useful if you want to plan gifts ahead or if you want to check your gift saving progress.

item.universal: This gift is {expValue, plural, 60 {adored} other {loved}} by everyone and gives {exp} EXP!

choiceBox.name: Gift Choice Box
choiceBox.description: A gift box that lets you choose the gift you want.

student.notice: To get started, select a student from the dropdown above.

irrelevantGifts.title: Notice
irrelevantGifts.description: Some of the gifts you selected will not be displayed because they are not relevant to the selected student. In order to change them, uncheck the "Only Display Favorite Gifts" option.

breakdown.title: Gift Breakdown
breakdown.description: Breakdown of gifts and their EXP values.

bond.inventoryTip: Tip: to save your gift inventory and bond targets (BETA).

remaining.title: EXP Needed to Reach Rank {targetBond}: {expNeeded}
remaining.description: In order to go from Rank {currentBond} to Rank {targetBond}, you will need one of the following:
remaining.optimalNote: * Note: The optimal breakdown is calculated based on a total of {paddedExp} EXP.

lessons.title: Lessons Breakdown
lessons.description: If you wanted to gain {exp} EXP through lessons alone, here's how many lessons it would take you at each rank and level.

deleteInventory.title: Delete Gift Inventory?
deleteInventory.description: Are you sure you want to delete this gift inventory? The gift counts, as well as all the associated targets will be permanently removed.

deleteTarget.title: Delete Gift Target?
deleteTarget.description: Are you sure you want to delete this gift target? The bond data, as well as the selected gifts will be permanently removed. Your gift inventory will not be affected.

save.title: Save target data?
save.description: You have unsaved changes in your bond setup. Would you like to save them in the cloud before leaving the page?
